talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
What was it?? It was something important... Hmm...
(Rubinart thinks for a while but it seems like he failed to recall what he was going to say)
<html>$Clumsy Reconciliation$</html>

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Hmm that wouldn't do. (Rubinart shakes his head)
Go and take a stroll at the Passage of Broken Recollections first. Maybe I'll remember by the time you're back.
Oh by the way, do well like last time! (Clear the Passage of Broken Recollections in any difficulty level with A Rank or higher)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I remembered!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You're right. It's about time he returned...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
…Is there a place called Garden of Time and Space…?
A priestess there seems to have news about Geraint. Velskud went to bring him back, remember?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
The priestess was asking the Elves to tell you to come and find her just now. (Rubinart yawns) He should just come back, why did he go through the trouble of sending a letter?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I shouldn't have wasted my time clearing those stupid dungeons!</html>
<html>Are you sure you really couldn't remember?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Hey, aren't you overeacting here??

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Huh? The letter arrived not long ago. There's no need for such a fuss.
Letters don't have feet, it won't run away.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Yeah yeah... Be on your way. Seriously, be worried about yourself if you have time to worry about dragons. (Rubinart grumbles. Go to the Garden of Time and Space and meet Madeleine)

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
{user_nick}. I just received this letter from Geraint.
It seems like it arrived at a weird place and ended up all the way here.
(Madeleine hands over a letter)

$Geraint$
I'll get straight to the point. Why did you send the Black Knight?

$Geraint$
I understand that you want to take revenge for Argenta too, but I didn't know I'd meet him so easily. You're pretty clever.

$Geraint$
So we fought.

$Geraint$
Hah! But he couldn't even control his jewels! Serves him right for taking Argenta's jewel! It was easy for me to counter his stupid attacks.

$Geraint$
But he endured my blows really well. Hmph. Is it because he has a big body?? And he kept talking even when we were fighting. Why did he have to shout at me the moment he saw me??

$Geraint$
He kept scolding me saying that I'm stupid and weak and that after all those years I didn't learn how to take care of myself... For on and on! It was really sickening! Why does he have so much negative feelings inside him? I thought we were friends last time, but why does he scold me like that? I must have been such an idiot. Of all people, why did I have a rogue friend like him...

$Geraint$
After hearing the story about 50 years ago, I felt a little sorry for him but after seeing him this time, I completely changed my mind!! Hmph!! I can't imagine the Velskud you told me is the same person as that stubborn irritating idiot! And besides...

$Geraint$
He kept asking whether I really am Geraint! Just how many times does he have to ask that!!! Who else can I be if I'm not Geraint, huh?!?! Argh, he's really making me frustrated!!! He killed Argenta and that's bad enough. But is he a dimwit too?!?! How many times does he have to say I haven't changed and then contradict himself and say I'm not the Geraint he used to know, huh?!

$Geraint$
But still... It was hard for me to defeat him... He's not strong but why is it like this!! (You can almost hear Geraint grumbling). Actually he almost killed me once, but he kicked me in the butt instead of slashing me with the sword, saying that I'm pathetic... So, I owe him one...

$Geraint$
Would Argenta be disappointed in me…?
Uhh... But I still have chance.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(And how did he get to know that...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I think I'll return later than I thought 'cos I was delayed by the stupid Black Knight.
By the way, I didn't want to mention this but I heard that you were worried about me. YOU worried about ME? Hah!

$Geraint$
Anyway, so I'm writing this letter so that you won't worry about me. Be grateful!
And if you have time to worry about me, worry about your own self, you stupid jellyfish!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(He's just worried you might create trouble...)</html>
<html>(Maybe deep in his heart he knows that Velskud isn't his enemy too...?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I think I'll be travelling with that thief from now. He just wouldn't get off my back. It's irritating but I can't do anything about it.
Anyway, you should stay right there and wait for me. I'm alive and well so don't you go anywhere!

$Geraint$
…By the way, I heard I'm supposed to buy back souvenirs. That's what friends do, isn't it?
I'll just pick whatever I like. You can chew volcanic rocks, can't you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I think I'll be dead before I can blame you!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
…I don't have much money so I'll just keep it within my budget. Don't blame me about it.
I'll just... put some sugar on it for you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I was really worried about him but he seems to be having a good time...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
It's fun to watch the change in your expression.

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
Haha... You must be one of the lucky adventurers who ever receive a letter from a dragon.
It means he's alive and well to have sent you a letter so doesn't that make you relieved?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Tell her about your plan to fight at the Red Dragon Nest)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
…You look like you're troubled about something. May I know what it is about?

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
…Hmm… (Madeleine thinks for a while)
Does that mean you are not relying on Geraint or Velskud?
I don't know about Velskud, but that would make Geraint sad. You travelled with him for a long time.

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
...Sometimes there are feelings that can't be taken for fun.
Handling it the right way could be an opportunity, but it could also become a poisoned blade at times. Especially in young hearts...
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
I can hear many stories when I'm here.
The story about Ancient Dragon and you, and the story about the Silver Dragon who was deeply upset...

$Priestess of Darkness Madeleine$
...Even when you are tormented by the shaking world, the center of this world will still be the one who has the willpower that can't be shaken... Maybe there will come a day for us to help you, {user_nick}...(Madeleine says things that makes you feel like you understand and you don't at the same time)

journal.title: Clumsy Reconciliation 1
journal.contents:
Rubinart said he had something to tell you but couldn't recall what it was and told you to clear the Passage of Broken Recollections. Clear the dungeon with at least A Rank in any difficulty level.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections
journal.destination: Clear the Passage of Broken Recollections
journal.todo_msg: Clear the Passage of Broken Recollections with A Rank or higher.

journal.title: Clumsy Reconciliation 2
journal.contents:
You have cleared the Passage of Broken Recollections. Go back to Rubinart.

Anu Arendel - Red Dragon Rubinart
journal.destination: Go back to Rubinart in Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: You have completed Rubinart's mission. Go back to Rubinart.

journal.title: Clumsy Reconciliation 3
journal.contents:
Geraint's letter is with Madeleine?!
You have no idea how the letter ended up there but go and read it.

Saint Haven (Garden of Time and Space Entrance) -Garden of Time and Space (Lv80)(Priestess of Darkness Madeleine)
journal.destination: Talk to Madeleine at the Garden of Time and Space
